abstract: Technicians at the Pantex plant near Amarillo have removed the uranium from the last of the nation’s largest nuclear bombs, a cold war relic known as the B53.
snippet: Technicians at the Pantex plant near Amarillo have removed the uranium from the last of the nation’s largest nuclear bombs, a cold war relic known as the B53.
lead_paragraph: Technicians at the Pantex plant near Amarillo have removed the uranium from the last of the nation’s largest nuclear bombs, a cold war relic known as the B53.

headline.main: Texas: Uranium Removed From Biggest U.S. Bomb
